naming conventions.file: snake_case (file names are not case sensitive)

Like a list of files that have predictable names

answers/.explanation: The folder to store the answers to the questions in the quiz
A collection of files that contain the answers used in the quiz

assets/.other folders: Self explanatory. Note: If you want to make a folder for a specific file type, you can

lesson/./base.css: The base css file that every lesson uses
The css file used for each respective lesson. Note: Not every lesson needs a custom css file, these files could be useless

helper/.explanation: I have no idea, require.js asked me to do this -Alex
